post:
-----------------------------------------
The UnderHost 2021 Black Friday / Cyber Monday Sale has arrived with great deals on all kinds of services, from shared hosting to dedicated servers.

DEDICATED SERVER: Free cPanel License this weekend on any dedicated servers!

Enter discount code CPANELBFCM2020 at checkout; the cPanel license remains FREE as long you keep your servers.

SHARED HOSTING: 50% OFF this weekend on any shared hosting on any contract terms!

Enter discount code SBFCM2020 at checkout.

VPS / CLOUD HOSTING: 30% OFF this weekend on any VPS package!

Enter discount code VBFCM2020 at checkout to receive 30% OFF as long as you keep the VPS.

These fantastic offers are available the whole Black Friday weekend, and Cyber Monday expires on December 2, 2021

* Customers may use only one promotional coupon code at a time per new order.
† Applies to new orders only. Valid for new and existing customers purchasing any new services.
-----------------------------------------

Are you looking for a solid host? Look no further. Come home to UnderHost, and stop traveling from host to host.

Since 2007 UnderHost, has been providing quality hosting based on a simple success formula, customer service, server uptime, integrity, and privacy.

VPS Package List
Canada / US: http://underhost.com/usa-ca-vps.php
Offshore: http://underhost.com/offshore-vps.php
Offshore Windows: http://underhost.com/windows-vps.php

Admin-Level Support
We don’t give you the keys and let you crash. Our expert support is available should you encounter any problems.

High Availability
All of our virtual private servers is hosted in a highly secured state-of-the-art data center located in The Netherlands, Hong Kong, and Russia.

DMCA FREE
UnderHost do ignores DMCA takedown notices and also accept anonymous payment methods such as bitcoin.

Free Control Panel
Our VPS is set up with FREE cPanel License, Apache, MySQL, PHP, Firewall and One-time securing and optimization or FREE Windows Server 2012 License with Remote Desktop Access!

Free Migration Assistance
Changing hosting doesn’t have to be a hassle. We are more than happy to assist in moving your data from your old web host.
